channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'Trump Is An Ageist,' Says Anthony Scaramucci. He Claims Saudi Prince MBS Used Trump's Disregard For Younger People To Play Him
US Navy Super Hornets launched history's 'largest airstrike' from an aircraft carrier — 125,000 pounds of munitions, admiral says
Ramps connecting 2 major Mass. highways will be closed for ‘most of day,’ officials warn
Hikers stumble across treasure hidden on a mountain trail, sparking an investigation into its origin
After reports of deportations to South Sudan, US says it's removed 8 people convicted of crimes
DOJ ending probes of Minneapolis and Louisville police departments
item.description: The Justice Department said it will bring an end to investigations launched during the Biden administration after the deaths of George Floyd in Minnea...

item.title: Watch: Tornado tears roof off factory in Tennessee, severe weather continues in central U.S.
item.description: Tornadoes and severe storms continue to tear through the central and southern parts of the U.S., including Tennessee and Alabama. CBS News' Nicole Val...

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Freedom Caucus chair says 'no way' budget bill passes today
item.description: Freedom Caucus Chairman Andy Harris said there is “no way” the “One Big Beautiful Bill Act” passes in the House on Wednesday.

item.title: Most AAPI adults oppose college funding cuts and student deportations, a new poll finds
"Never Too Late": Anthony Mason pursues painting passion
item.description: Painter Sharon Sprung teaches CBS News senior culture correspondent Anthony Mason how to paint as he pursues a longtime passion at the Art Students Le...

item.title: Democratic Rep. McIver is due for first court appearance on assault charges
Target CEO says tariffs risk 'massive' costs, but price hikes a 'last resort'
item.description: Target reported a drop in sales in its most recent quarter.

item.title: Trump and Musk meeting with South Africa's president amid tensions
item.description: South African-born billionaire Elon Musk will join President Trump's meeting with South African President Cyril Ramaphosa.

item.title: Democratic Rep. Gerry Connolly dies at 75
item.description: Democratic Rep. Gerry Connolly of Virginia has died, his office announced Wednesday morning. He was 75 years old.

item.title: House GOP works to push through bill advancing Trump's agenda
item.description: House Republicans have worked through the night to move a megabill advancing President Donald Trump's legislative agenda through a key committee.

item.title: WATCH: Driver trapped after dump truck slams into home
item.description: Emergency crews rushed to a chaotic scene Tuesday afternoon after a dump truck plowed into a home in New Jersey.

item.title: Minnesota wildfire interactive maps show how far infernos have spread
item.description: Three massive wildfires continue to rage north of Duluth in northeastern Minnesota.

item.title: Arrested New Orleans jail worker says he helped inmates escape after stabbing threat
item.description: Authorities have arrested an Orleans Parish Sheriff’s Office maintenance worker in connection with the escape of 10 jail inmates.
